title: [Bug] [BuildCheck] [Documentation]: Add a verbose instruction for custom analyzer creation.
body:
### Issue Description

We do have a specification for the custom analyzers in the main documentation file for BuildCheck: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/documentation/specs/BuildCheck/BuildCheck.md#custom-analyzers-authoring
However, this specification alone is not enough to enable customers to easily create analyzers. 

I suggest:
- Add a verbose instruction for creating and using a custom analyzer.
- Include there a link to the custom analyzers template: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/tree/59c2ff861191e4af4a479d92efdb809812cabe01/template_feed/content/Microsoft.AnalyzerTemplate
